mapper.insert: insert into POINT(point_id, point_amount, point_contents, point_chg_date) values ('point'||point_seq.nextval, #{point_amount}, #{point_contents}, sysdate)
insert into POINT(point_id, point_amount, point_contents, point_chg_date) values ('point'||point_seq.nextval, -1*#{point_amount}, #{point_contents}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT p.point_chg_date, m.real_name, p.point_contents, p.point_amount, p.point_balance FROM POINT p, MEMBER m WHERE p.point_owner = m.member_no and p.point_owner = #{member_no}

select point_id, point_balance, point_type, point_amount, point_contents, point_chg_date, point_owner from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(POINT SYS_C004144) */ rownum rn, point_id, point_balance, point_type, point_amount, point_contents, point_chg_date, point_owner from POINT where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from POINT where point_no > 0
